description: Love is a hyperactive, sympathetic and emotional girl, who tries her best at matchmaking but often fails. She adores dancing and is a big fan of the dancing unit "Trinity". She also dislikes sports and studying. She is being taught dancing by Miyuki, the leader of dancing group "Trinity"( Miyuki decides to teach her as thanks for saving her in ep one, whom she admires. She later forms a group with her childhood friends, Miki and Inori. Love has dirty blond hair that is shoulder length which she wears in two tight ponytails at the top of her head.
name: Momozono Love
